task.title: Why Eat Vegan
task.shortdesc: Health benefits when it comes to eating vegan.

taskbody.context:
There are many reasons to eat vegan, the benefits to animals, plus more but one of the best reasons is because of how healthy it can be for you
Health Benefits
Eating vegan reduces the amount of saturated fats that you normally consume in dairy products, and meat
You increase your intake of carbohydrates, which eliminates the need for your body to burn muscle tissue
. Beans, nuts, peas, lentils, and soy products are all great ways to get the right amount of protein in a vegan diet.
Vegan diets have a higher amount of vitamins that the body needs
There is a large amount of antioxidants in vegan diets that help protect the body against cell damage
These are just some of the pluses on a ling list of benefits that come with a vegan diet
